{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=TL-WR2543ND |revision=v1 |series=N450 |upc=845973051563 |asin=B006YCHW5O |fcc_date=09/13/2012 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=TE7WR2543N |ic_id=8853A-WR2543N |pcb_id=2050500170 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR7242;AR7242-AH1A; |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S25FL064PIF |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Zentel |ram1_model=A4S12D40FTP-G5 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, JP1,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9380 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8367R |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=selectable dual-band |addl_chips=2.4/5GHz Dual-Band Wi-Fi Front End Module;SiGe;SE2595L;;3; |stock_boot=U-Boot |tp_firmware=OpenWrt,DD-WRT,Gargoyle |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|450Mbps Dual-Band Wireless N Gigabit Router}} :[http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/?categoryid=1682&model=TL-WR2543ND Product page]
"2050500170" and "Rev:1.0" is silkscreened on a v1.2 board. :The processor is a [[Atheros]] AR7242-AH1A. :Selectable Dual-Band
===Links=== *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/tl-wr2543nd On the '''OpenWrt''' wiki] ([[ath79]]) *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=34966 On the '''OpenWrt''' forums] ([[MIPS 24Kc]]) :with bootlog and ''cat /proc/cpuinfo'' *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=658725 On the '''DD-WRT''' forums], [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=658726 and again] *[http://www.gargoyle-router.com/ ''Gargoyle-router Web'']
